stories: Geopolitics risk premium: Trump puts a 10–15 day Iran nuclear “window” on the tape; WSJ-style “limited strike” framing + prediction markets elevate near-term tail risk

Japan keeps BOJ normalization risk alive: core CPI steady at 2.0% with services PMI still expansionary

Event-driven: Domo ($DOMO) launches formal strategic alternatives process (including a sale), reiterates FY26 outlook
